projects.name: CodeIDE
projects.description: It is a web-based code editor that supports multiple languages. It is built from Scratch using Nextjs, TailwindCSS, and Monaco Editor for the Frontend and Nodejs along with Socket.io for the backend. Dockerized the application for easy deployment.

projects.name: FormCraftAI
projects.description: Building forms can often be tedious and time-consuming, but using FormCraftAI, one can leave the difficult labor to AI and create professional, user-friendly forms in seconds. Whether it is surveys, registrations, or feedback forms, FormCraftAI simplifies it all-no more messing about layouts, question structures, or formats. Simply describe what you need, and our intelligent AI will generate the most suitable form for you, saving time and effort on your part to focus on gathering insights and making informed decisions. Manual form building will be in the past, making way for effortless automation with FormCraftAI! Note: Currently since this project is hosted on Vercel, the verification is taking error. To go around this for now, please just click on Advance and then proceed to the site.

projects.name: Payment Template Package
projects.description: It is a NPM package which helps you to integrate payment gateways like Razorpay, Stripe in your backend application. Downloaded by more than 500+ developers worldwide in lifetime.

projects.name: RealtimeSudoku
projects.description: It is a site for users to play Sudoku with their friends. There are different levels which you can try to compete it.

projects.name: ResumeWorth
projects.description: A project designed to enchance, evaluate and roast resumes by leveraging AI-driven insights and document parsing. Built using Groq API for llama model. Used over 700+ users in lifetime

projects.name: Hotel Booking App
projects.description: It is an application where the users can add Hotels and book hotels. A fullstack application made using React, Nodejs, Express, MongoDB. Integrated with Stripe for payments and e2e testing using Playwright.

projects.name: Sorting Visualizer
projects.description: It is a web-based application that helps you visualize various sorting algorithms like Bubble Sort, Merge Sort, Quick Sort, etc. Built using React and TailwindCSS.

projects.name: Code to Picture
projects.description: It is a Web based application that converts your code into an image. Built using React and TailwindCSS and react-simple-code-editor.

projects.name: Appetiizers
projects.description: Made this application to learn SwiftUI, it is a very basic application where you can see the list of appetizers and their details and users can add items for orders.

projects.name: Quiz App
projects.description: Made this application to further learn SwiftUI, it is a very basic application where you can see the list of questions and their options and users can select the correct answer.

projects.name: AnimeStreamer
projects.description: Made this Application to watch Anime.

projects.name: SQLite Viewer
projects.description: A simple web-based application to view SQLite databases. Built using NextJS, ShadCN ,TailwindCSS, and sql.js.
